title: In case of development of land admeasuring 4000 sq
clause_text: In case of development of land admeasuring 4000 sq. m and more (excluding the area under Road set back/DP Road) in Residential and Commercial Zones, amenity areas as specified below shall be provided fronting on public road or shall be provided with a perpetual independent right of way. Such amenity area shall be exclusive of area under perpetual independent right of way.
section: In Plots/lay-outs of the land admeasuring 4000 sq. m or more:
